englishExplanation: Let good things occur to the king of the country, Who looks after his people well, in the path of justice, Let Cows and Brahmins have a pleasant life daily, Let all people of the world have a very pleasant life.
englishShloka:
Swasthi prajabhya paripalayantham, Nyayena margena maheem maheesa |
 Gobrahmanebhyo shubhamasthu nithyam, Loka samastha Sukhino bhavantu ||
kannadaShloka:
॥ ॐ ॥
 ಸ್ವಸ್ತಿ ಪ್ರಜಭ್ಯಾ ಪ್ಯಾರಿಪಲಾಯಂತ್ಹ್ಯಾಮ್, ನೈಯೆನಾ ಮಾರ್ಗೆನಾ ಮಹೀಮ್ ಮಾಹೀಸಾ |
 ಗೊಬ್ರಾಹ್ಮನೆಬಿಯೊ ಶುಬ್ಹಾಮಾಸ್ತು ನಿಥ್ಯಾಮ್, ಲೋಕಾ ಸಮಸ್ತಾ ಸುಖಿನೊ ಭವಾಂಟು ||
sanskritShloka:
॥ ॐ ॥
 स्वस्ति प्राजाभ्य: परिपालयन्ताम् न्याय्येन मार्गेण महीम् महीशा:।
 गोब्राह्मणेभ्य: शुभमस्तु नित्यम् लोका: समस्ता: सुखिनो भवन्तु॥१॥
title: Mangala

englishExplanation: Let the monsoon be timely and plentiful,Let earth be covered with vegetation, Let the country live without problems, And let good people never have fear.
englishShloka:
Kale varshathu parjanya, Pruthwee sasya shalini |
 Deso yam kshobha rahitha, SAjjana santhu nirbhaya ||
kannadaShloka:
ಕಾಲೆ ವಾರ್ಷಾತು ಪಾರ್ಜನ್ಯಾ, ಪ್ರುತ್ವೀ ಸಸ್ಯ ಶಲಿನಿ |
 ಡೆಸೊ ಯಮ್ ಖೋಭಾ ರಹಿತಾ, ಸಾಜಾನಾ ಸಾಂತು ನಿರ್ಭಯಾ ||
title: Mangala

englishExplanation: Let sonless people have son, Let people with son have grand sons, And let people who are poor or rich, Live and see one hundred autumns.
englishShloka:
Aputhra puthrina santhu, Puthrina santhu pouthrina |
 Adhana sadhana, Santhu jeevanthu sarada satham || 3 ||
kannadaShloka:
ಅಪುತ್ರ ಪುಥ್ರಿನಾ ಸಂತು, ಪುತ್ರಿನಾ ಸಂತು ಪೌತ್ರಿನಾ |
 ಅಧನಾ: ಸಧನಾಃ ಸ೦ತು ಜೀವ೦ತು ಶಾರದ: ಶತಮ್
sanskritShloka:
अपुत्र पुत्रिन सन्तु पुत्रिन सन्तु पौत्रिण:।
 अधना: सधना: सन्तु जीवन्तु शारद: शतम्॥३॥
title: Mangala

englishExplanation: Om, May All become Happy, May All be Free from Illness. May All See what is Auspicious, May no one Suffer. Om Peace, Peace, Peace.
englishShloka:
Sarve bhavantu sukhinaha, Sarve santhu niramayaaha |
 Sarve bhadrani pasyanthu, Ma kaschid dukha bhag bhaveth || 4 ||
kannadaShloka:
ಸರ್ವೇ ಭವಂತು ಸುಖಿನ:, ಸರ್ವೇ ಸಂತು ನಿರಾಮಯಾ: |
 ಸರ್ವೇ ಭದ್ರಾಣಿ ಪಶ್ಯನ್ತು ಮಾ ಕಶ್ಚಿದ್ ದುಖ: ಭಾಗ್ ಭವೇತ್ || ೪ ||
 || ಓಮ್ || ಇತಿ ಶ್ರೀ ವಿಷ್ಣು ಸಹಸ್ರ ನಾಮಾ ಸ್ತೊತ್ರ೦ ಸಂರ್ಪೂಣ೦ ||
sanskritShloka:
सर्वे भवन्तु सुखिन: सर्वे सन्तु निरामया:।
 सर्वे भद्राणि पश्यन्तु मा कश्चिद् दु:खभाग्भवेत्॥४॥
 ॥ॐ॥ इति श्री विष्णु सहस्रनाम स्तोत्रम् सम्पूर्णम्॥
title: Mangala
